title: Challenges for reliable analysis of uranium in natural waters using laser-induced fluorimetry/LED-fluorimetry in the presence of fluoride and diverse humic substances in hot arid regions and future advances – review
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, 3,511-521
DOI: 10.1039/D3VA00318C, Critical Review
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
D. P. S. Rathore, P. K. Tarafder, V. Balaram
There is large variations in diverse water samples due to time interval between sample collection and analysis in the presence of fluoride and humic substances in hot arid regions.
